short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An utils tool for calucalating the print size based on DPI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is used for calculating the image pixel size by given printed size and DPI. Also the S2iCode Logo image pixel size is calculated.
